page.description: The AlphaSportsWeb application displays ERRORPAGE.HTM if a parameter sent to a page is missing or incorrect.

section.title: Discussion
section.description: ERRORPAGE.HTM is an ordinary HTML page. It contains a link that will return the user to the previous page. The page opens only if a required parameter is not passed to a page.

section.title: Links
section.description: The ASWVENDONE.A5W and INVDETAIL.A5W pages and NAV_INT navigation component call the ERRORPAGE.HTM page. ERRORPAGE.HTM in the Browser

section.title: Page Source
section.description: ERRORPAGE.HTM is pure HTML page. An interesting part of the page is the JavaScript button that navigates the user to the last page viewed.
